cab.content: If.S .E 'C R E T.BATTLE SITUATION - NOON - 1st MAY, 1918j1. The general situation on the whole front is unchanged.and no attacks have been delivered by the enemy this morning.2. On the front METEREN-YPRES artillery activity continues to be intense.30 The French improved their positions In the neighbourhood of KRABBENHOF FARM (north-east of LOCRE) last night.Fop the personal information -of the Minister5 only.-General Staff,War Office, S.Tf.1 1st May, 1918,Issued at 1*20 p,.m.
